An AAM-Certified Training Program

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”54px” header_3_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#b67d6d” header_3_font_size=”56px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”44px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Violet Zherka Training Academy

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Violet Zherka’s class lessons incorporate four of your most important senses needed to create: listening, visualizing, discussing, and touch. She has applied her background in art into her program. From an artistic approach, Violet has made it possible for almost anyone to learn, understand, love, and create.

Here at Violet Zherka’s Training Academy, artists are born![/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#fundamental-training” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”Muli|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” custom_padding=”20px|40px|20px|40px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”6px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About Us Section” module_id=”fundamental-training” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ z_index=”9″ custom_padding=”110px|0px|110px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Poppins|500||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” header_2_font_size=”16px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Violet Zherka

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#000000″ header_3_font_size=”36px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Comsetic Tattoo Fundamental Training Course

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#486066″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Here at Violet Zherka’s Academy we offer a top notch educational experience. Our Primary Training Course,is set up to help you succeed! This intensive packed course will give the beginning student a solid fundamental education to get started in the cosmetic tattoo industry.

We are a licensed institute with an approved training program by the American Academy of Micropigmentation (AAM), and Violet Zherka is a Certified Permanent Cosmetics Professional of the Society of Permanent Cosmetic Professionals (SPCP). Violet is also a Certified Platinum Trainer with the AAM. Our Training course follows all the American Academy of Micropigmentations guidelines, which are the highest in the permanent cosmetics industry. The AAM is one of the largest international organizations in the permanent cosmetics industry and one of the only organizations that officially approves permanent cosmetic trainers.

This 106 hour primary course is an excellent introduction to permanent cosmetics (41 hours of home study and 65 hours of class room study).

Come and learn the necessary skills that will set you apart from other technicians starting out in the business!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://violetzherka.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Primary-Training-wout-SPCP-trainer-listed-.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”More Info” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#e8ad9d” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”Muli|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” custom_padding=”20px|40px|20px|40px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”6px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

box_shadow_vertical=”10px” box_shadow_blur=”24px” box_shadow_spread=”6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” global_colors_info=”{}”]DermaPlaning is a method of exfoliation that consists of using a sterile surgical scalpel. It is used to scrape off the top layer of dull dead skin cells and vellus hair (peach fuzz), in order to reveal a smoother, brighter complexion.[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”https://violetzherka.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/dermaplaning-training-course-brochure.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”Muli|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” custom_padding=”20px|113px|20px|113px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”6px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Lash Lift” image_max_width=”50%” admin_label=”Class” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ header_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#444444″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#486066″ body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”40px|30px|40px|30px” animation_style=”slide” animation_delay=”100ms” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”10px” box_shadow_blur=”24px” box_shadow_spread=”6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” global_colors_info=”{}”]Looking to add lash lifting to your treatment menu? We get it it! Lash lifting has become a global phenomenon. Almost every women can benefit from this service. Ohh and men too! [/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”https://violetzherka.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Lash-lift-training-°brochure.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”Muli|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” custom_padding=”20px|113px|20px|113px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”6px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Brow Lamination” image_max_width=”50%” admin_label=”Class” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ header_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#444444″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.3em” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#486066″ body_line_height=”1.8em” background_color=”#ffffff” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”40px|30px|40px|30px” animation_style=”slide” animation_delay=”200ms” animation=”off” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”10px” box_shadow_blur=”24px” box_shadow_spread=”6px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.06)” global_colors_info=”{}”]Brow lamination is a relatively new procedure that can give brows a combed and uniformed look. This treatment creates the Instagram popular “fluff brow” look by taming the hairs into an upward hair flow. It is also known as the brow perm.[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”https://violetzherka.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Brow-lamination-brochure.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”Muli|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” custom_padding=”20px|113px|20px|113px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”6px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: An AAM-Certified Training ProgramViolet Zherka Training AcademyViolet Zherka’s class lessons incorporate four of your most important senses needed to create: listening, visualizing, discussing, and touch. She has applied her background in art into her program. From an artistic approach, Violet has made it possible for almost anyone to learn, understand, love, and create. Here at […]
